abstract.p: Correction of Aug 26 profile of Bawa Jain, which referred incorrectly to David Finn, whose company helped organize Millennium World Peace Summit of Religious and Spiritual Leaders; he co-founded company

block.p: A Public Lives profile on Aug. 26 about Bawa Jain, general secretary of the Millennium World Peace Summit of Religious and Spiritual Leaders, held at the United Nations, referred incorrectly to David Finn, whose company helped organize it. He is a co-founder of Ruder Finn public relations, with William Ruder -- not the sole founder. A reader's letter dated Sept. 13 pointed out the error; this correction was delayed by an editing lapse.
